value.0: <StartAction>[The Control Stone stands ready to accept your command.]</Start>
<StartAction>[A red light appears within the depths of the Control Stone as it obeys your command.]</Start>
<StartAction>[A green light appears within the depths of the Control Stone as it obeys your command.]</Start>
<StartAction>[The stone erupts into a bright white light. The gates to the Market District should now be open.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Before you lies the Control Stone of Ghaarak, magical energies crackling over its smooth surface.]</Start>
<StartAction>[As you lay your hands on the Control Stone, you feel its massive power coursing through your arms.]</Start>
<StartAction>[The Control Stone sits silently upon its altar, awaiting some sort of prompting from you.]</Start>

<StartAction>[As you bring your weapon down upon the Control Stone's surface, a bolt of electricity arcs out from its surface, striking you squarely in the chest, and knocking you to the ground. The stone appears undamaged...]</Start>

<StartAction>[You try several various manipulations of the Control Stone, but none appear to have any effect upon it. You have the feeling that you are missing something critical regarding the stone.]</Start>

<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> <StartAction>[Though you remember High Sorcerer Zhiram once explained the Control Stone's operation to you and your fellow students, you simply can't recall his words at the moment...]</Start>

<StartAction>[Success]</Start> <StartAction>[You suddenly recall a time during one of your lessons when High Sorcerer Zhiram showed you and your fellow students how the Control Stone was operated.]</Start>
<StartAction>[After spending a few moments inspecting the Control Stone, you believe you understand how it operates.]</Start>
<StartAction>[By uttering a simple arcane phrase, "Milak Navok," you should be able to gain access to the runes of protection which guard access to the Control Stone.]</Start>

<StartAction>[Each of these runes is part of a complex arrangement of focal points for the magical energies coursing through the Control Stone. Only with the proper arrangement of the runes can you gain mastery over the stone.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Each rune can be placed in one of nine positions, and only the correct arrangement of the runes will attune the Control Stone to your mind.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Once you have arranged the runes as you like, you can place your hands on the stone, and attempt to force your will upon it.]</Start>
<StartAction>[If the runes have been arranged in an incorrect order, though, the Control Stone's defenses will be set in place, sending a massive shock through your body.]</Start>
<StartAction>[As you utter the arcane phrase, three runes slowly appear on the surface of the stone, each with nine points surrounding it.]</Start>
<StartAction>[The Control Stone rests idle upon its altar, awaiting an action from you.]</Start>
<StartAction>[You attempt to overcome the tremendous power of the Control Stone, but it appears the defensive wards placed over it have not been overcome.]</Start>
<StartAction>[A great arc of lightning erupts from the Control Stone, hitting you squarely in the chest and knocking you to the ground.]</Start>
<StartAction>[The Control Stone hums into action, and you feel your mind connecting with the powerful sorceries within.]</Start>
<StartAction>[The rune drifts slowly to the surface of your hand, and to your surprise, you realize it can be manipulated into any one of nine positions.]</Start>
<StartAction>[The rune slides easily into its new position.]</Start>
<< Set owner's journal quest to "JT_ST_1_MAIN" >>
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if "N_MODULE_STAGE" is 1. >>

[Sitting upon the altar before you is a crystal stone, magical energies humming throughout its crystal surface. This is the Control Stone of Ghaarak, crafted by the sorcerers of the city to power their magical creations.]
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if "N_MODULE_STAGE" is 0. >>
<< This conversation node does nothing but reset the variable "N_TALK_SWITCH" >>
<StartAction>[Command the stone to deactivate all of the Imperial Constructs.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Command the stone to activate all of the Imperial Constructs as your allies.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Exert your will upon the stone to lower the seals on the Market Gate and the sorcerer in this chamber.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Leave.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Place your hands on the stone.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Attempt to destroy the stone.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Tamper with the stone a bit.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Lore]</Start> <StartAction>[Attempt to remember what you have heard about the Control Stone.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Spellcraft]</Start> <StartAction>[Attempt to use your knowledge of magical devices to discover how the stone operates.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Speak the words "Milak Navok."]</Start>
<StartAction>[Tell me what the current position has combination set at.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Focus your will on the Control Stone in an attempt to gain mastery over it.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Place your hand on the right rune.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Place your hand on the middle rune.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Place your hand on the left rune.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Leave this rune in its current position.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 9.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 8.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 7.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 6.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 5.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 4.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 3.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 2.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 1.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Move the rune into position 0.]</Start>
